Package org.neo4j.internal.batchimport.cache.idmapping.string

Class ParallelSort.SortWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.internal.batchimport.cache.idmapping.string.ParallelSort.SortWorker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    ParallelSort
    private class ParallelSort.SortWorker
extends Object
implements Runnable
    Sorts a part of data in dataCache covered by trackerCache. Values in data cache doesn't change location, instead trackerCache is updated to point to the right indexes. Only touches a designated part of trackerCache so that many can run in parallel on their own part without synchronization.
